overview: Lola Bulgari and Rossella Visconti are enjoying their time in the Fake Hostel, and they're dancing around their room in their underpants! As the ladies shake their big tits and thick asses, the Landlord sees them on his cameras and gets turned on. Making his way to their room, the Landlord notices they have been smoking cigarettes, an infraction punishable by a fine of $ 5000! The girls don't have $ 5000, so they offer to pay with a double blowjob. The Landlord fucks both girls all over the room, and Rossella cums as Lola gives her and the Landlord rimjobs. Both girls lie on the bed and open their mouths, and are rewarded with a facial.
title: Backpackers 4
